name: el_left_through_wide_head
description: EL 1 (erase left) with cursor at wide char head should also clean up the orphaned continuation
comment: Print A, 中 (wide: cols 1-2), BC. CUP(1,2) → cursor at (0,1) the wide char head. EL 1 erases from start of line through cursor (cols 0-1). The continuation at (0,2) is orphaned and cleaned up.
